last_episode_to_air.name: The Penguin Who Loved Me
last_episode_to_air.overview: Doris the dolphin's quest to rescue her brother Francis from Seaville brings her to the lovestruck Kowalski.

name: The Penguins of Madagascar
overview:
The Penguins of Madagascar is an American CGI animated television series airing on Nickelodeon. It stars nine characters from the DreamWorks Animation animated film Madagascar: The penguins Skipper, Kowalski, Private, and Rico; the lemurs King Julien, Maurice, and Mort; and Mason and Phil the chimpanzees. Characters new to the series include Marlene the otter and a zookeeper named Alice. It is the first Nicktoon produced with DreamWorks Animation.

A pilot episode, "Gone in a Flash", aired as part of "Superstuffed Nicktoons Weekend" on November 29, 2008, and The Penguins of Madagascar became a regular series on March 28, 2009. The series premiere drew 6.1 million viewers, setting a new record as the most-watched premiere.

Although the series occasionally alludes to the rest of the franchise, The Penguins of Madagascar does not take place at a precise time within it. McGrath, who is also the co-creator of the film characters, has said that the series takes place "not specifically before or after the movie, I just wanted them all back at the zoo. I think of it as taking place in a parallel universe."

episodes.name: Gone in a Flash
episodes.overview: Julien and Maurice fight over a camera that fell from the sky.

episodes.name: Launchtime
episodes.overview: Frustrated by their obnoxious lemur neighbors, the penguins decide to take a vacation... to the moon.

episodes.name: Haunted Habitat
episodes.overview: The penguins leap into action when a spooky noise frightens Marlene.

episodes.name: Operation: Plush and Cover
episodes.overview: The popularity of stuffed Mort dolls causes Julien to sabotage the toys, prompting a recall.

episodes.name: Happy King Julien Day
episodes.overview: Maurice bribes the animals with candy so they'll celebrate "King Julien Day."

episodes.name: Paternal Egg-Stinct
episodes.overview: Marlene discovers a lost egg and thinks the Penguins would be perfect egg watchers.

episodes.name: Assault and Batteries
episodes.overview: When Skipper steals Julien's radio batteries, a wild chase gets them stuck in a kangaroo pen.

episodes.name: Penguiner Takes All
episodes.overview: Julien challenges the penguins to play Capture the Flag, but the lemurs win every time.

episodes.name: Two Feet High and Rising
episodes.overview: Julien can't take Mort's obsessive feet touching, so he exiles Mort from the lemur habitat.

episodes.name: Tangled in the Web
episodes.overview: When the zoo installs web cams to bring in new visitors, Private accidentally becomes an Internet star.

episodes.name: Crown Fools
episodes.overview: Skipper accidentally causes King Julien to lose his beloved crown. Now the penguins go on a dangerous mission to retrieve the crown from the sewer.

episodes.name: The Hidden
episodes.overview: Marlene goes to greet the mysterious new animals... then promptly disappears.

episodes.name: Kingdom Come
episodes.overview: Maurice is left in charge when Julien is carted off to the zoo infirmary.

episodes.name: All Choked Up
episodes.overview: After Rico ingests a strange liquid, he discovers he can no longer regurgitate items from his belly.

episodes.name: Little Zoo Coupe
episodes.overview: The penguins and lemurs face off in a winner-take-all race around the zoo.

episodes.name: Popcorn Panic
episodes.overview: When the penguins lose access to their favorite snack, Skipper and crew leap into action to find a new supply.

episodes.name: Go Fish
episodes.overview: The penguins aren't happy when their fish supplies are replaced by imitation fish cakes.

episodes.name: Miracle on Ice
episodes.overview: The sewer rats challenge the penguins to a game of ice hockey.

episodes.name: Eclipsed
episodes.overview: When a solar eclipse occurs, Julien is tricked into thinking it's his fault.

episodes.name: Needle Point
episodes.overview: When the vet rounds up the penguins to give them a shot, Skipper's fear of needles takes over.

episodes.name: Mort Unbound
episodes.overview: Mort quadruples in size after being exposed to Kowalski's super-ray.

episodes.name: Roomies
episodes.overview: Marlene's can't stand her new roommate, so she asks the penguins to help get rid of her.

episodes.name: Lemur See, Lemur Do
episodes.overview: When a robot is sent to the zoo to learn from Julien, the penguins set out to retrain it.

episodes.name: Misfortune Cookie
episodes.overview: Rico ignores a freaky fortune from his cookie, but Julien thinks Rico needs to believe in the superstition.

episodes.name: Roger Dodger
episodes.overview: The rats have been terrorizing Roger the alligator, so he comes to the penguins for help.

episodes.name: Skorca!
episodes.overview: A giant balloon float of a killer whale haunts Private.

episodes.name: Otter Gone Wild
episodes.overview: When Marlene sets foot outside of captivity, she snaps and becomes a feral beast.

episodes.name: Cat's Cradle
episodes.overview: Officer X of New York City's animal control is after Max, the penguins' stray cat friend.

episodes.name: Monkey Love
episodes.overview: Phil tries to win the heart of a visiting chimpanzee named Lulu.

episodes.name: Tagged
episodes.overview: The penguins must ditch the watchful eye of a nosey scientist before he stumbles upon all their secrets.

episodes.name: What Goes Around
episodes.overview: A girl loses her doll at the zoo, and Rico is convinced to give up his own doll to replace it.

episodes.name: Mask of the Raccoon
episodes.overview: A mysterious bandit is robbing the zoo animals of their beloved possessions.

episodes.name: Out of the Groove
episodes.overview: Julien is horrified when the baboons' dance routine is getting more attention than his own.

episodes.name: Jungle Law
episodes.overview: A zoo blackout elevates King Julien's delusional rulership ideas to a whole new level.

episodes.name: I Was a Penguin Zombie
episodes.overview: The other penguins fear that Skipper has become a zombie after a visit to the vet.

episodes.name: Sting Operation
episodes.overview: Some unfriendly hornets make plans to sting anyone who enters the zoo.

episodes.name: All King, No Kingdom
episodes.overview: After a mishap with Julien, Maurice and Mort are banished from his kingdom.

episodes.name: Untouchable
episodes.overview: A tiny frog with a nasty attitude moves to the zoo and starts terrorizing the other animals.

episodes.name: Miss Understanding
episodes.overview: Skipper has an identity crisis when Alice mentions that one of the penguins is actually female.

episodes.name: Over Phil
episodes.overview: After a fight, the penguins show Mason and Phil how much they need each other.

episodes.name: An Elephant Never Forgets
episodes.overview: Burt the elephant asks the penguins to help him break out of the zoo.

episodes.name: Otter Things Have Happened
episodes.overview: Marlene catches a glimpse of Fred the squirrel and falls in love at first sight.

episodes.name: Zoo Tube
episodes.overview: The animals make a commercial to promote the zoo after a new TV channel renders them obsolete.

episodes.name: Snakehead
episodes.overview: When a giant fish terrorizes the duck pond, Skipper leads a mission to eliminate the menace.

episodes.name: Jiggles
episodes.overview: Kowalski accidentally creates a living blob of jelly... with a big appetite.

episodes.name: The Falcon and the Snow Job
episodes.overview: When a beautiful falcon crash-lands in the zoo, Skipper insists that she stays.

episodes.name: The Penguin Stays in the Picture
episodes.overview: Private is upset when Mort is chosen to be the cover animal for the zoo's brochure.

episodes.name: Dr. Blowhole's Revenge
episodes.overview: When arch-nemesis, Dr Blowhole kidnaps King Julien and threatens to melt the Arctic Circle, the Penguins have to stop him, but they walk into a clever trap.

episodes.name: The Red Squirrel
episodes.overview: The penguins are recruited by Buck Rockgut to help him capture the Red Squirrel.

episodes.name: It's About Time
episodes.overview: Kowalski travels back in time to prevent himself from building a time machine.

episodes.name: Gator Watch
episodes.overview: When Roger's sewer home becomes unbearable, the penguins try to find him a new home in the city.

episodes.name: In The Line of Doody
episodes.overview: The penguins must protect the zoo commissioner from Frankie the pigeon's wrath.

episodes.name: Can't Touch This
episodes.overview: The penguins try to help Randy overcomes the problems he's having at the petting zoo.

episodes.name: Hard Boiled Eggy
episodes.overview: Eggy the duckling is convinced that he can handle dangerous missions like the penguins.

episodes.name: The Lost Treasure of the Golden Squirrel
episodes.overview: It's a race against time when the whole gang competes with the Rat King to find the Lost Treasure of the Golden Squirrel, which may have a dangerous curse on it!

episodes.name: Fit To Print
episodes.overview: When the penguins realize their operation is at risk of being exposed, they attempt to destroy the evidence.

episodes.name: Operation: Cooties
episodes.overview: The penguins and Julien believe Marlene has cooties after overhearing a group of schoolchildren.

episodes.name: Mr. Tux
episodes.overview: The Amarillo Kid arrives and declares that he has a score to settle with "Mr. Tux."

episodes.name: Concrete Jungle Survival
episodes.overview: Private is ready to move up in rank within the penguin commando unit... or is he?

episodes.name: Stop Bugging Me
episodes.overview: A group of cockroaches ask the penguins for help with their exterminator problem.

episodes.name: Field Tripped
episodes.overview: The penguins become convinced that a kid on a field trip to the zoo is spying on them.

episodes.name: Badger Pride
episodes.overview: Private wants to be friends with a group of badgers... until they threaten to hurt Marlene.

episodes.name: Kaboom and Kabust
episodes.overview: When the Penguins send Rico off to help King Julien, an unlikely friendship develops between them.

episodes.name: The Helmet
episodes.overview: Julien causes chaos at the zoo when he steals Kowalski's new invention.

episodes.name: The Big Squeeze
episodes.overview: When animals begin disappearing, the penguins suspect Savio, the new boa constrictor.

episodes.name: Night and Dazed
episodes.overview: The penguins accidentally launch Leonard the koala out of the zoo and into midtown Manhattan.

episodes.name: Wishful Thinking
episodes.overview: Private tells Mort that if he throws a penny in the fountain, his wish will come true... and it works!

episodes.name: April Fools
episodes.overview: Julien goes on a pranking spree when he learns about April Fool's Day.

episodes.name: Hello, Dollface
episodes.overview: Rico desperately wants to a voice chip upgrade for his doll-girlfriend.

episodes.name: Huffin and Puffin
episodes.overview: A puffin from Skipper's past returns and tries to take over the penguins' habitat.

episodes.name: Invention Intervention
episodes.overview: After a series of gadget malfunctions, Skipper orders Kowalski to stop inventing.

episodes.name: Cradle and All
episodes.overview: When a baby stroller rolls outside the zoo, the penguins redefine the term "daycare."

episodes.name: Driven to the Brink
episodes.overview: The penguins' car seems to have a mind of its own after Rico rebuilds it.

episodes.name: Friend-in-a-Box
episodes.overview: Kowalski steals the computer chip from Mort's new video game to finish an invention.

episodes.name: Work Order
episodes.overview: The penguins must stop a contractor from completing repairs on their habitat before he destroys the world!

episodes.name: Hot Ice
episodes.overview: Two thieves stash a very expensive diamond necklace at the zoo.

episodes.name: Command Crisis
episodes.overview: When Skipper is knocked on the head, he's unable to lead the penguins on an important mission.

episodes.name: Truth Ache
episodes.overview: Private accidentally drinks Kowalski's truth serum and starts spilling the penguin's secrets to the rest of the zoo.

episodes.name: The All Nighter Before Christmas
episodes.overview: When the zoo is closed for Christmas, the animals prepare for "Kidsmas" -- their annual celebration complete with decorations, food, gifts and a visit from Santa.

episodes.name: Whispers and Coups
episodes.overview: Julien believes Maurice is plotting an overthrow and the penguins send him through basic training.

episodes.name: Brush With Danger
episodes.overview: Burt the elephant discovers a love for painting, and he's remarkably talented.

episodes.name: Love Hurts
episodes.overview: Private is smitten with the zoo nurse, but the only way he can see her is to get injured.

episodes.name: The Officer X Factor
episodes.overview: The penguins have a plan to beat the heat, but they'll need Alice out of the way.

episodes.name: Brain Drain
episodes.overview: Kowalski's attempt to super-charge his brain backfires and now he's dumber than mud.

episodes.name: Right Hand Man
episodes.overview: The lemur habitat gets a new resident, Clemson, and Julien loves to order him around.

episodes.name: Danger Wears a Cape
episodes.overview: Private finds a stack of comic books and ignores Skipper's request to destroy them.

episodes.name: Operation: Break-Speare
episodes.overview: Shakespeare in the park has inspired Private as he struts around quoting from the Bard's works.

episodes.name: Rat Fink
episodes.overview: A simple plan to have Mort spy on the rats ends up with Julien and Skipper captured.

episodes.name: Kanga Management
episodes.overview: The penguins accidentally blow up the koala habitat wall, so Leonard has to bunk up with Joey.

episodes.name: King Julien For a Day
episodes.overview: King Julien and Skipper switch places for a day, troubling everyone involved.

episodes.name: Maurice At Peace
episodes.overview: The penguins intercept a fax with catastrophic news -- Maurice has only 24 hours to live!

episodes.name: Cute-Astrophe
episodes.overview: When Private's cuteness factor tests off the charts, the penguins use it to their advantage.

episodes.name: Operation: Neighbor Swap
episodes.overview: Annoyed by the lemurs' constant music, the penguins plan to get them moved to another part of the zoo.

episodes.name: All Tied Up With a Boa
episodes.overview: The animals panic when a boa constrictor escapes from the zoo.

episodes.name: Rock-a-Bye Birdie
episodes.overview: Kowalski's invention turns Skipper into a baby, so the penguins must find a way to change him back.

episodes.name: Herring Impaired
episodes.overview: The penguins journey to the bottom of the Atlantic for preserved herring.

episodes.name: A Visit From Uncle Nigel
episodes.overview: Private's quirky Uncle Nigel pops in for a quick visit from across the pond.

episodes.name: The Hoboken Surprise
episodes.overview: After a sailing trip to the Massachusetts coast goes wrong, the penguins wind up at the Hoboken Zoo, which turns out to be a perfectly pristine paradise... or is it?

episodes.name: The Return of the Revenge of Dr. Blowhole
episodes.overview: Dr. Blowhole, the penguins' evil dolphin nemesis, returns to New York with a diabolical plan to turn them into creatures of destruction.

episodes.name: Pets Peeved
episodes.overview: The Vesuvius twins adopt Skipper and Julien, then force them to fight each other.

episodes.name: Byte-Sized
episodes.overview: Kowalski invents a group of tiny robots, which he says will protect the penguins from harm.

episodes.name: Operation: Good Deed
episodes.overview: The penguins are inspired seeing a good deed and decide to perform their own.

episodes.name: When the Chips are Down
episodes.overview: Mort and Private are sucked into a vending machine after trying to retrieve a snack.

episodes.name: Time Out
episodes.overview: Kowalski's time-stop invention falls into the wrong hands -- Julien's!

episodes.name: Our Man in Grrfurjiclestan
episodes.overview: Special Agent Rockgut contacts the penguins with a warning that Red Squirrel has brainwashed one of them.

episodes.name: Gut Instinct
episodes.overview: The animals think Julien caused old lady Gladys to slip and hurt herself.

episodes.name: I Know Why the Caged Bird Goes Insane
episodes.overview: Kowalski is laid up in the hospital, so he can't attend the invention expo, and it's driving him crazy.

episodes.name: Arch-Enemy
episodes.overview: Private accidentally steps on Dale the snail, so Dale wants some payback.

episodes.name: The Big S.T.A.N.K.
episodes.overview: Julien becomes enamored with the gigantic toilet that the penguins built, but it's all a trap!

episodes.name: Operation: Antarctica
episodes.overview: Private's heart overcomes his instinct to flee as he helps a stranded seal get back to Antarctica, and the rest of the team follow in the submarine to make sure they make it.

episodes.name: The Big Move
episodes.overview: Julien is supposed to keep quiet about the penguins' secret tunnel, be he blabs anyway.

episodes.name: Endangerous Species
episodes.overview: Kowalski tries to bring a penguin species back from extinction, but clones a Dodo instead.

episodes.name: Loathe at First Sight
episodes.overview: Skipper orders Kowalski's love ray to be put in reverse.

episodes.name: The Trouble With Jiggles
episodes.overview: When the penguins discover that Jiggles is still alive, the others start squishing it, which makes it multiply.

episodes.name: Alienated
episodes.overview: Lemmy the robot returns from Mars with a space squid.

episodes.name: The Most Dangerous Game Night
episodes.overview: Marlene plans a game night to help the zoo animals bond but it takes a terrible turn when the snacks run out.

episodes.name: Feline Fervor
episodes.overview: When King Julien is accidentally bounced out of his kingdom, he is mistaken for a cat and adopted by old lady Gladys.

episodes.name: King Me
episodes.overview: Kowalski uses an invention to switch King Julian's mind with all the penguins in order to win a contest.

episodes.name: The Otter Woman
episodes.overview: Marlene's fur is bleached when Alice over-chlorinates the otter habitat.

episodes.name: Action Reaction
episodes.overview: Skipper is accidentally doused with a substance called Inflatium, so whenever he is stressed he swells up like a balloon.

episodes.name: Thumb Drive
episodes.overview: After realizing that Maurice's thumbs could prove to be very useful, the penguins recruit him into their team.

episodes.name: Operation: Big Blue Marble
episodes.overview: The Penguins are faced with a global battle when their specialty food-making machine belches out a toxic cloud that threatens not just the zoo, not just the city, but the earth itself!

episodes.name: Hair Apparent
episodes.overview: The Commissioner's toupee blows off and soon gets stuck on Maurice's head.

episodes.name: Love Takes Flightless
episodes.overview: After Rico saves Shelly, she falls for him but things turn a little crazy when she kidnaps his doll in a fit of jealousy.

episodes.name: Littlefoot
episodes.overview: Marlene wants see a concert but every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a monster!

episodes.name: Smotherly Love
episodes.overview: Ma takes up residence in the Penguins Lair. She smothers the penguins with love and they devolve into a bunch of softies, opening the door for Hans to take advantage.

episodes.name: Antics on Ice
episodes.overview: The other penguins agree to take Private to see "Lunacorns on Ice" to cheer him up.

episodes.name: Showdown on Fairway 18
episodes.overview: A putter is at the center of controversy when the Amarillo Kid returns to the zoo.

episodes.name: Street Smarts
episodes.overview: A stray dog refuses to give up Mort after believing he is a squeaky toy, so the penguins set out to rescue him with the help of Max the cat.

episodes.name: Nighty Night Ninja
episodes.overview: Watching too many ninja movies has brainwashed Leonard the koala. During the day, as he sleeps, he terrorizes everyone by sleepfighting.

episodes.name: A Kipper for Skipper
episodes.overview: Skipper agrees gives a day off from training to the first penguin brings him a kipper.

episodes.name: High Moltage
episodes.overview: The penguins need Private's hypercute to escape Alice in order to see their favorite action star at the cinema, but Private's molting renders him unable to engage the talent.

episodes.name: Nuts to You
episodes.overview: Fred seeks financial advice from King Julien when he stumbles upon an oak tree loaded with acorns, but the Red Squirrel has his own plans for the loot.

episodes.name: The Terror of Madagascar
episodes.overview: A special delivery has come from Madagascar. A baby Fossa!

episodes.name: Mental Hen
episodes.overview: A hen who seems to have psychic abilities moves into the zoo, and a skeptical Kowalski tries to prove she's a fraud.

episodes.name: Siege the Day
episodes.overview: Private is tasked with babysitting Eggy and his siblings for Momma Duck while the rest of the team is away, and has to protect the ducklings from the combined forces of the hornets and the sewer rats.

episodes.name: P.E.L.T.
episodes.overview: Skipper must prove he can still be a leader when his strength starts to decline.

episodes.name: Private and the Winky Factory
episodes.overview: When Private learns that the Peanut Butter Winkies are going out of production, he urges a raid on the factory and Skipper is so impressed he lets him command the mission.

episodes.name: Best Laid Plantains
episodes.overview: It's a special day when Bada and Bing get a shipment of delicious plantains to eat. Although they jealously guard the African bananas, King Julien's determined to taste them too.

episodes.name: Skipper Makes Perfect
episodes.overview: Skipper's having one of those perfect days, and he decides to use the opportunity to settle an old score.

episodes.name: Marble Jar Head
episodes.overview: How in the world is Rico supposed to behave well when King Julien has kidnapped his doll, Miss Perky, with the intention of marrying her?

episodes.name: Good Night and Good Chuck
episodes.overview: A former news anchor grows suspicious of the penguins when he begins working at the zoo.

episodes.name: Best Foes
episodes.overview: Kowalski invents an enemy detector but it doesn't work. Old enemies are now friends and old friends are now enemies.

episodes.name: Night of the Vesuviuses
episodes.overview: The annual Zoo Snooze is here! This year the Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets. The zoosters plan to exact sweet revenge on the twins.

episodes.name: Operation: Lunacorn Apocalypse
episodes.overview: The Penguins are faced with a World Domination battle when Private accidentally unleashes KuchiKukhan the Destroyer of Worlds. Can they stop him in time to save the World?

episodes.name: Operation: Swap-anzee
episodes.overview: The Space Agency sends Private to the moon. The other birds can't monkey around if they hope to get him home again.

episodes.name: Snowmageddon
episodes.overview: Snowmageddon hits and traps Skipper and Marlene in the convenience store, while Kowalski and Private get snowed into a tree.

episodes.name: Tunnel of Love
episodes.overview: When a massive sneeze from Rico causes the underground tunnel system beneath the zoo to rupture, Skipper calls in 4 beavers to fix the situation.

episodes.name: The Penguin Who Loved Me
episodes.overview: Doris the dolphin's quest to rescue her brother Francis from Seaville brings her to the lovestruck Kowalski.
